title: Skeptics Guide To The Universe Premium #473 - Ad Free

Science or Fiction [ Show Answers ]

Item #1	A recently published analysis indicates that, if we continue our current mix of electricity generation, 20-40% of the world will have serious water shortage by 2020, and there will be a global water shortage by 2040. http://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2014/07/140729093112.htm
Item #2	Physicists have successfully separated the properties of a particle from the particle itself, so the particle was in one location while its magnetic moment was in another. http://blogs.chapman.ed
